jog_controller.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 """
3 The Jog Controller allows to easily command the robot manually. It means that you can use
4 mouse input, Leap Motion, Wii Controller or even Image processing to calculate determine
5 where the robot should go
6 This controller can be used :
7 - directly by using ROS Topic | ROS Low Level (see the file client_jog_interface_mouse.py which shows how to use
8 a mouse to control the robot)
9 - with Python ROS Wrapper | "Medium" Level
10 - through the TCP server | High Level
11 """
12 
13 import rospy
14 import math
15 from threading import Lock
16 from .command_enums import ArmCommanderException
17 
18 # Quaternion
19 from tf.transformations import quaternion_from_euler, quaternion_multiply, euler_from_quaternion
20 
21 # Command Status
22 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
23 
24 # Messages
25 from std_msgs.msg import Bool, String
26 
27 from trajectory_msgs.msg import JointTrajectory
28 from trajectory_msgs.msg import JointTrajectoryPoint
29 from geometry_msgs.msg import Pose, Quaternion
30 from control_msgs.msg import JointTrajectoryControllerState
31 from moveit_msgs.msg import RobotState as RobotStateMoveIt
32 from moveit_msgs.msg import Constraints
33 
34 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.msg import CommandJog
35 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import RobotState
36 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import RPY
37 
38 # Services
39 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.srv import JogShift, JogShiftRequest
40 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import SetBool
41 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import GetBool
42 
43 
44 class JogController:
45 
46  def __init__(self, arm_state):
47  self.__arm_state = arm_state
48 
49  # - Values Init
50  self._shift_mode = None
51  self.__collision_detected = False
52  self._last_target_values = [0.0 for _ in range(6)]
53  self._last_shift_values_cmd = None
54  self._target_lock = Lock()
55  self._target_values = None
56 
57  self._current_jogged_joints = []
58  self.__error_tolerance_joint = rospy.get_param("~error_tolerance_joint")
59  self.__time_without_jog_limit = rospy.get_param(
60  "~time_without_jog_TCP_limit") # jog disabled after one second for the jogTCP Niryo Studio
61 
62  # - Move It Commander / Get Arm MoveGroupCommander
63  self.__arm = self.__arm_state.arm
64 
65  # - Kinematics
66  self.__kinematics_handler = self.__arm_state.kinematics
67 
68  # Validation
69  self.__parameters_validator = self.__arm_state.parameters_validator
70 
71  jog_limits = rospy.get_param("~jog_limits")
72  self.__pose_translation_max = jog_limits["translation"]
73  self.__pose_rotation_max = jog_limits["rotation"]
74  self.__joints_rotation_max = jog_limits["joints"]
75 
76  self._new_robot_state = RobotState()
77  self._last_robot_state_published = RobotState()
78 
79  # - Publisher which publishes if JogController is enabled
80  self._enabled = False
81  self.__jog_errors_cpt = 0
82 
83  self._jog_enabled_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot/jog_interface/is_enabled', Bool, queue_size=3)
84  self._jog_errors_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot/jog_interface/errors', String, queue_size=3)
85 
86  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / rospy.get_param("~jog_enable_publish_rate")), self._publish_jog_enabled)
87 
88  self._check_disable_jog_timer = None
89  self._last_command_timer = rospy.get_time()
90  self._publish_jog_enabled()
91 
92  # - Direct publisher to joint controller
93  self._joint_trajectory_publisher = rospy.Publisher(rospy.get_param("~joint_controller_name") + '/command',
94  JointTrajectory,
95  queue_size=3)
96 
97  # Publishing rate
98  self._timer_rate = rospy.get_param("~jog_timer_rate_sec")
99  self._publisher_joint_trajectory_timer = None
100 
101  # - Subscribers
102  # - Joint controller state, used to check collisions
103  rospy.Subscriber(
104  rospy.get_param("~joint_controller_name") + '/state',
105  JointTrajectoryControllerState,
106  self.__callback_joint_controller_state)
107 
108  # topic used to jog pose via Niryo Studio, to avoid calling the service
109  self._jog_command_ik = None
110  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/send_jog_command_ik',
111  CommandJog,
112  self.__callback_send_jog_command_ik,
113  queue_size=20)
114 
115  # topic used to jog joints via Niryo Studio, to avoid calling the service
116  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/send_jog_joints_command',
117  CommandJog,
118  self.__callback_send_jog_joints_command,
119  queue_size=10)
120 
121  # - Service
122  # Service to enable Jog Controller
123  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot/jog_interface/enable', SetBool, self.__callback_enable_jog)
124  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot/jog_interface/jog_shift_commander', JogShift, self.__callback_jog_commander)
125 
126  # - Callbacks
127 
128  def __callback_enable_jog(self, req):
129  if req.value:
130  return self.enable()
131  else:
132  return self.disable()
133 
134  def __callback_send_jog_command_ik(self, msg):
135  # check if the learning mode is false and the robot is calibrated
136  self.__check_before_use_jog()
137 
138  shift_mode = msg.cmd
139  if shift_mode != self._shift_mode:
140  self._reset_last_pub()
141  self._shift_mode = shift_mode
142 
143  shift_command = list(msg.shift_values)
144  shift_command[:3] = [
145  min([v, math.copysign(self.__pose_translation_max, v)], key=abs) for v in shift_command[:3]
146  ]
147  shift_command[3:] = [min([v, math.copysign(self.__pose_rotation_max, v)], key=abs) for v in shift_command[3:]]
148 
149  if self._last_shift_values_cmd != msg.shift_values:
150  self._last_shift_values_cmd = msg.shift_values
151  self.__jog_errors_cpt = 0
152 
153  try:
154  success, potential_target_values = self._get_new_joints_w_ik(shift_command)
155  except ArmCommanderException as e:
156  return self.__publish_jog_error(e.status, "Error while validating pose : {}".format(e.message))
157  if not success:
158  return self.__publish_jog_error(CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE,
159  "Unable to find an invert kinematics for the target position")
160 
161  success, message = self.__validate_ik_joints(potential_target_values)
162  return self.__publish_jog_error(CommandStatus.SUCCESS if success else CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_FAILURE,
163  message)
164 
165  def __publish_jog_error(self, status, message):
166  if status < CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
167  self.__jog_errors_cpt += 1
168  if self.__jog_errors_cpt == 3:
169  self._jog_errors_publisher.publish(message)
170  else:
171  self.__jog_errors_cpt = 0
172 
173  def __callback_send_jog_joints_command(self, msg):
174  # check if the learning mode is false and the robot is calibrated
175  self.__check_before_use_jog()
176 
177  shift_mode = msg.cmd
178  if shift_mode != self._shift_mode:
179  self._reset_last_pub()
180  self._shift_mode = shift_mode
181 
182  if self._last_shift_values_cmd != msg.shift_values:
183  self._last_shift_values_cmd = msg.shift_values
184  self.__jog_errors_cpt = 0
185 
186  shift_command = list(msg.shift_values)
187  if shift_mode == JogShiftRequest.JOINTS_SHIFT:
188  # Accumulate multiple commands if they come faster than the publish rate
189  shift_command = [min([v, math.copysign(self.__joints_rotation_max, v)], key=abs) for v in shift_command]
190  target_values = [actual + shift for actual, shift in zip(self._last_target_values, shift_command)]
191 
192  # get index of the jogged joints in a list
193  joints_to_jog = [i for i, value in enumerate(shift_command) if value != 0]
194 
195  target_values = self.__limit_params_joints(target_values)
196 
197  try:
198  self.__validate_params_joints(target_values) # validate joints according to joints limits
199  except ArmCommanderException as e:
200  message = "Jog Controller - Error while validating joint : {}".format(e.message)
201  rospy.logwarn_throttle(1, message)
202  return self.__publish_jog_error(CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_FAILURE, message)
203 
204  # validate target joints validity, based on collisions checking
205  try:
206  valid, link_colliding1, link_colliding2 = self.__check_joint_validity_moveit(target_values)
207  if not valid:
208  return self.__publish_jog_error(
209  CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_FAILURE,
210  "Joints target unreachable because of collision between {} and {}".format(
211  link_colliding1, link_colliding2))
212  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
213  message = "Jog Controller - Error while validating joint : {}".format(e.message)
214  rospy.logwarn_throttle(1, message)
215  return self.__publish_jog_error(CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_FAILURE, message)
216 
217  if self.__collision_detected:
218  return self.__publish_jog_error(CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_FAILURE, "Collision detected")
219 
220  self.set_target_values(target_values)
221  self._current_jogged_joints = joints_to_jog
222  self._new_robot_state = RobotState()
223  return self.__publish_jog_error(CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success")
224 
225  def __callback_joint_controller_state(self, msg):
226  # check if collision when jogging joints
227  current_joints_error = msg.error.positions
228 
229  # this error tolerance is lower than the one in arm_commander bc the jog is much slower
230  for error, tolerance in zip(current_joints_error, self.__error_tolerance_joint):
231  if abs(error) > tolerance and self._enabled and self._shift_mode == JogShiftRequest.JOINTS_SHIFT:
232  self.__collision_detected = True
233  self.__arm_state.set_learning_mode(True)
234  abort_str = "Command has been aborted due to a collision or " \
235  "a motor not able to follow the given trajectory"
236  rospy.logwarn(abort_str)
237  self.disable()
238  rospy.sleep(1) # sleep so if the arrow in NS is still pressed, the jog wont re-start directly.
239  return
240 
241  self.__collision_detected = False
242 
243  def __callback_jog_commander(self, msg):
244  # check if the learning mode is false and the robot is calibrated
245  self.__check_before_use_jog()
246 
247  shift_mode = msg.cmd
248  if shift_mode != self._shift_mode:
249  self._reset_last_pub()
250  self._shift_mode = shift_mode
251 
252  shift_command = list(msg.shift_values)
253  if shift_mode == JogShiftRequest.POSE_SHIFT:
254  shift_command[:3] = [
255  min([v, math.copysign(self.__pose_translation_max, v)], key=abs) for v in shift_command[:3]
256  ]
257  shift_command[3:] = [
258  min([v, math.copysign(self.__pose_rotation_max, v)], key=abs) for v in shift_command[3:]
259  ]
260  try:
261  success, potential_target_values = self._get_new_joints_w_ik(shift_command)
262  except ArmCommanderException as e:
263  return e.status, "Error while validating pose : {}".format(e.message)
264  if not success:
265  return CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE, "Unable to find on invert kinematics for the target position"
266  else:
267  self.set_target_values(potential_target_values)
268  else:
269  # Accumulate multiple commands if they come faster than the publish rate
270  shift_command = [min([v, math.copysign(self.__joints_rotation_max, v)], key=abs) for v in shift_command]
271  target_values = [actual + shift for actual, shift in zip(self._last_target_values, shift_command)]
272 
273  target_values = self.__limit_params_joints(target_values)
274 
275  joints_to_jog = [i for i, value in enumerate(shift_command) if value != 0]
276 
277  try:
278  self.__validate_params_joints(target_values) # validate joints according to joints limits
279  except ArmCommanderException as e:
280  return e.status, "Error while validating joints : {}".format(e.message)
281 
282  # validate target joints validity, based on collisions checking
283  try:
284  valid, link_colliding1, link_colliding2 = self.__check_joint_validity_moveit(target_values)
285  if not valid:
286  if link_colliding1 is not None and link_colliding2 is not None:
287  return CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_FAILURE, \
288  "Joints target unreachable because of collision between {} and {}".format(
289  link_colliding1, link_colliding2)
290  else:
291  return CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_FAILURE, \
292  "Joints target unreachable because of collision between two parts of Ned"
293  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
294  return e, "Error while validating joint : {}".format(e.message)
295 
296  self._current_jogged_joints = joints_to_jog
297  self.set_target_values(target_values)
298  self._new_robot_state = RobotState()
299  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Command send"
300 
301  # - Publishers
302 
303  def _publish_jog_enabled(self, *_):
304  msg = Bool()
305  msg.data = self._enabled
306  try:
307  self._jog_enabled_publisher.publish(msg)
308  except rospy.ROSException:
309  return
310 
311  def _publish_joint_trajectory(self, *_):
312  if not self._enabled:
313  return
314 
315  target_values = self.get_target_values()
316  if not target_values:
317  return
318  msg = JointTrajectory()
319  msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
320 
321  point = JointTrajectoryPoint()
322 
323  if self._shift_mode == JogShiftRequest.JOINTS_SHIFT:
324  # if jogging joint, we send a command with only one joint,
325  # thanks to the allow_partial_joints_goal parameter,
326  # so the other joints are not affected by the jog.
327  joint_names = []
328  positions = []
329 
330  for elem in self._current_jogged_joints:
331  joint_names.append('joint_{}'.format(elem + 1))
332  positions.append(target_values[elem])
333 
334  msg.joint_names = joint_names
335  point.positions = positions
336 
337  else:
338  msg.joint_names = self.__arm_state.joints_name
339  point.positions = target_values
340  point.time_from_start = rospy.Duration(self._timer_rate)
341  msg.points = [point]
342 
343  try:
344  self._joint_trajectory_publisher.publish(msg)
345  except rospy.ROSSerializationException:
346  rospy.logerr(target_values)
347  rospy.logerr(msg)
348 
349  # Reset Target
350  self.set_target_values(None)
351  self._current_jogged_joints = None
352 
353  # Save state for next time
354  self._last_target_values = target_values
355  self._last_robot_state_published = self._new_robot_state
356 
357  # - Setters & Getters
358  def set_target_values(self, target_values):
359  with self._target_lock:
360  self._target_values = target_values
361 
362  def get_target_values(self):
363  with self._target_lock:
364  target_values = self._target_values[:] if self._target_values else None
365  return target_values
366 
367  @staticmethod
368  def can_be_enable():
369  """
370  Check if Jog Controller can be enabled
371  Basically, it checks if commander is running
372 
373  :return: Bool indicating if Controller can be enabled
374  :rtype: bool
375  """
376  try:
377  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/is_active', 2)
378  except rospy.ROSException as e:
379  rospy.logerr(
380  f'Jog Controller - Impossible to connect to service "/niryo_robot_arm_commander/is_active" : {e}')
381  return False
382 
383  try:
384  is_active_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/is_active', GetBool)
385  response = is_active_service()
386  return not response.value
387  except rospy.ServiceException:
388  return False
389 
390  def enable(self):
391  """
392  Enable jog controller if possible
393 
394  :return: status, message
395  :rtype: (GoalStatus, str)
396  """
397  if not self.can_be_enable():
398  msg_str = "Jog Controller - Wait for the end of command to enable Jog Controller"
399  rospy.logwarn(msg_str)
400  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, msg_str
401 
402  self._enabled = True
403  self._reset_last_pub()
404  self._last_command_timer = rospy.get_time()
405  self._publisher_joint_trajectory_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(self._timer_rate),
406  self._publish_joint_trajectory)
407  self._check_disable_jog_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / rospy.get_param("~jog_enable_publish_rate")),
408  self._check_for_disable)
409  msg_str = "Jog Controller - Enabled"
410  rospy.loginfo(msg_str)
411  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, msg_str
412 
413  def disable(self):
414  """
415  Disable jog controller
416 
417  :return: status, message
418  :rtype: (GoalStatus, str)
419  """
420  if not self._enabled:
421  msg_str = "Jog Controller - Already Disabled"
422  rospy.loginfo(msg_str)
423  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, msg_str
424 
425  self._enabled = False
426  self._shift_mode = None
427  self.__jog_errors_cpt = 0
428  self.set_target_values(None)
429  self._current_jogged_joints = None
430  # Shutdown timer (Only launched when jog enabled)
431  self._publisher_joint_trajectory_timer.shutdown()
432  self._publisher_joint_trajectory_timer = None
433  self._check_disable_jog_timer.shutdown()
434  self._check_disable_jog_timer = None
435 
436  msg_str = "Jog Controller - Disabled"
437  rospy.loginfo(msg_str)
438  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, msg_str
439 
440  def is_enabled(self):
441  """
442  Return the if Jog Controller is enable
443 
444  :return: True if enable else False
445  :rtype: bool
446  """
447  return self._enabled
448 
449  # - Useful Functions
450  def _check_for_disable(self, *_):
451  if not self.is_enabled():
452  return
453  delta_time = rospy.get_time() - self._last_command_timer
454  if delta_time > self.__time_without_jog_limit:
455  self.disable()
456 
457  def _reset_last_pub(self):
458  self._last_target_values = self.__arm_state.joint_states
459  self._last_robot_state_published = self.__arm_state.robot_state
460  self.__jog_errors_cpt = 0
461 
462  def _get_new_joints_w_ik(self, shift_command):
463  quat_jog = quaternion_from_euler(shift_command[3], shift_command[4], shift_command[5])
464  quat_target = quaternion_multiply(quat_jog,
465  [
466  self._last_robot_state_published.orientation.x,
467  self._last_robot_state_published.orientation.y,
468  self._last_robot_state_published.orientation.z,
469  self._last_robot_state_published.orientation.w
470  ])
471  rpy_target = RPY(*euler_from_quaternion(quat_target))
472 
473  self._new_robot_state = RobotState()
474  self._new_robot_state.position.x = self._last_robot_state_published.position.x + shift_command[0]
475  self._new_robot_state.position.y = self._last_robot_state_published.position.y + shift_command[1]
476  self._new_robot_state.position.z = self._last_robot_state_published.position.z + shift_command[2]
477  self._new_robot_state.orientation = Quaternion(*quat_target)
478  self._new_robot_state.rpy = rpy_target
479 
480  self.__validate_params_pose(self._new_robot_state)
481 
482  success, joints = self.__kinematics_handler.get_inverse_kinematics(
483  Pose(self._new_robot_state.position, self._new_robot_state.orientation))
484  return success, joints
485 
486  def __validate_params_pose(self, new_robot_state):
487  self.__parameters_validator.validate_position(new_robot_state.position)
488  self.__parameters_validator.validate_orientation(new_robot_state.rpy)
489 
490  def __validate_params_joints(self, joints):
491  self.__parameters_validator.validate_joints(joints)
492 
493  def __check_joint_validity_moveit(self, joints):
494  """
495  Check target joint validity (no collision) with MoveIt.
496  :return: The target joint validity in a boolean, and the two links colliding if available
497  """
498  robot_state_target = RobotStateMoveIt()
499  robot_state_target.joint_state.header.frame_id = "world"
500  robot_state_target.joint_state.position = joints
501  robot_state_target.joint_state.name = self.__arm_state.joints_name
502  group_name = self.__arm.get_name()
503  null_constraints = Constraints()
504  try:
505  response = self.__parameters_validator.check_state_validity(robot_state_target,
506  group_name,
507  null_constraints)
508  if not response.valid:
509  if len(response.contacts) > 0:
510  rospy.logwarn('Jog Controller - Joints target unreachable because of collision between %s and %s',
511  response.contacts[0].contact_body_1,
512  response.contacts[0].contact_body_2)
513  return False, response.contacts[0].contact_body_1, response.contacts[0].contact_body_2
514  else: # didn't succeed to get the contacts on the real robot
515  rospy.logwarn_throttle(
516  1,
517  'Jog Controller - Joints target unreachable because of '
518  'collision between two parts of Ned')
519  return False, None, None
520  else:
521  return True, None, None
522 
523  except AttributeError as _e: # maybe delete later, useful for the test on real robot when using the service
524  return True, None, None
525 
526  def __limit_params_joints(self, joints):
527  joints_limits = self.__parameters_validator.get_joints_limits()
528  for j, joint_value in enumerate(joints):
529  joints[j] = max(joints_limits[j].lower, min(joints_limits[j].upper, joint_value))
530  return joints
531 
532  def __validate_ik_joints(self, joints):
533  """
534  Check if the list of joints values received from the inverse kinematic is usable.
535  If a joint is bigger than 0.5 radian the list becomes None and a warning appears
536 
537  :return: List with the values from the inverse kinematic or None if the movement is too complicated
538  :rtype: list
539  """
540 
541  actual_joints = list(self.__arm_state.joint_states)
542  for i in range(len(joints)):
543  if abs(actual_joints[i] - joints[i]) > 0.5:
544  error_str = "Jog Controller can't execute this command: {}".format(
545  [round(joint, 3) for joint in joints])
546  rospy.logwarn_throttle(0.5, error_str)
547  self.set_target_values(None)
548  self._current_jogged_joints = None
549  return False, "Unable to find an invert kinematics for the target position " \
550  "close enough to the current position"
551  else:
552  self.set_target_values(joints)
553  return True, "Success"
554 
555  def __check_before_use_jog(self):
556  """
557  Check if the calibration has already been done on the robot and if the learning mode is off.
558 
559  :return: None
560  :rtype: None
561  """
562  hdw_st = self.__arm_state.hardware_status
563  if hdw_st.calibration_needed or hdw_st.calibration_in_progress:
564  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, "Cannot send command cause Jog because calibration is not done"
565 
566  if self.__arm_state.learning_mode_on:
567  try:
568  self.__arm_state.set_learning_mode(False)
569  rospy.sleep(0.1)
570  except (rospy.ROSException, rospy.ServiceException):
571  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, "Error while trying to turn Off learning mode"
572 
573  if not self._enabled:
574  ret, str_msg = self.enable()
575  if ret == CommandStatus.ABORTED:
576  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, "Cannot send command cause Jog is not activated and cannot be"
577  self._last_command_timer = rospy.get_time()
578
